snippet: Contract talks between the Columbus Blue Jackets and Ryan Johansen, their leading scorer, have reached a contentious impasse.
abstract: Contract talks between Columbus Blue Jackets and forward Ryan Johansen, their leading scorer, remain stalled; other NHL news noted.
lead_paragraph: Contract talks between the Columbus Blue Jackets and Ryan Johansen, their leading scorer, have reached a contentious impasse.

headline.main: Blue Jackets and Forward in Deadlock
